title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Real Estate Virtual Assistant Wanted (Full-Time | Long-Term | Work From Home)

Location: Remote 
Industry: Real Estate – Property Management, Lead Generation, Admin Support
Schedule: Monday to Friday | Full-Time | Aligned with Australian time zone

About Us

We are a rapidly growing real estate business based in Australia, and we’re on the lookout for an experienced Virtual Assistant with a strong background in the real estate industry. You’ll be joining a friendly team with opportunities to grow and contribute meaningfully to our success.

Your Role Will Include:

 Generating and nurturing real estate leads
 Following up leads via phone, email, and CRM
 Answering and making calls to clients, companies, and directors
 Managing rental properties, listings, and tenant inquiries
 Researching company websites, collecting data, and sending professional emails
 Following up with contacts to schedule meetings with directors
 Updating CRM and managing calendars, tasks, and communication
 Following instructions, processes, and systems provided (training available)

Must-Have Qualifications:

 Proven VA experience in the real estate industry (AU/US preferred)
 Excellent spoken and written English communication skills
 Confident in handling phone calls and client interactions
 Skilled in lead generation, follow-up, and CRM updates
 Highly organized and able to multitask
 Proficient with tools like Google Workspace, CRMs, Excel, dialers, etc.
 Fast, reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

*Bonus Points If You Have:*

* Experience with property managers, brokers, or investors
* Worked with property listing or inspection coordination tools
* Experience in LinkedIn/email outreach or appointment setting
* Knowledge of Australian rental/property platforms

Salary:

Competitive – Based on experience (Please include expected monthly rate in PHP in your application)


Why Join Us?

 Work with a growing Australian real estate business
 Friendly and respectful team environment
 Long-term, stable employment with career growth
 Full training and clear systems provided

To Apply, Please Complete the Following Questionnaire:

Only applicants who complete all fields will be considered.

1. How many years have you worked as a Virtual Assistant?
2. How many years have you worked in the real estate industry?
3. Have you worked with real estate agents, brokers, or property managers before? Please describe.
4. What CRMs or tools have you used (e.g., PropertyMe, Salesforce, Podio, HubSpot)?
5. Have you managed property listings, tenant communication, or inspections?
6. Do you have experience in lead generation? How did you do it?
7. Are you comfortable making and answering calls to clients and directors?
8. Share an example where your follow-up helped close a deal or schedule a meeting.

Technical & Admin Abilities

9. Have you researched and gathered contact data from websites before?
10. Can you write and send professional business emails?
11. List all tools/software you’re comfortable using (e.g., Google Workspace, Canva, CRMs, Slack, Zoom):
12. Can you work full-time during AEST business hours?

Compensation & Commitment

13. What is your expected monthly salary in PHP (full-time)?
14. When can you start?
15. Are you seeking long-term work?

Bonus (Optional but Appreciated)

16 Share any past work samples (e.g., screenshots, Google Drive, CRM reports):
17. Anything else you’d like to add about your experience or why we should hire you?


How to Submit Your Application

Please send your completed application (including all answers above) via OnlineJobs.ph or directly to our hiring team if you received this through another platform. Incomplete applications **will not be reviewed**.


We’re excited to meet dedicated and skilled individuals who are ready to grow with us. If that sounds like you, apply now!
